
## Intra-rater reliability 


### Cohenâ€™s kappa


```{r, message=F, warning=F}

kappa_pvalue=numeric()
kappa_value=numeric()
for (i in 1:6)
{
sub_data=data_raw[[i]]
ratings=sub_data[,2:3] %>% drop_na()
kappa_test=kappa2(ratings,weight="squared")
kappa_pvalue[i]=kappa_test$p.value
kappa_value[i]=kappa_test$value
}

data.frame(Time=names(data_raw)[1:6], kappa_value=round(kappa_value,4), kappa_pvalue=pvalue_adjust(kappa_pvalue)) %>%
datatable(extensions = 'Buttons',
          caption = "", 
            options = list(dom = 'Blfrtip',
                           buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel', 'pdf', 'print'),
                           lengthMenu = list(c(10,25,50,-1),
                                             c(10,25,50,"All"))))

```



* weighed Kappa test was used 

* [reference](https://www.andywills.info/rminr/irr.html)
